title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list in the File menu is not being persisted between sessions. This means that when the application is closed and reopened, the list of recently accessed files is empty.
OB: When reopening the application, the File menu does not display any recently accessed files in the MRU list.
EB: The MRU file list should be persisted between sessions, so that when the application is reopened, the list of recently accessed files is displayed in the File menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Open a file and make some changes.
3. Close the application.
4. Reopen the application.

Expected result:
The File menu should display the previously opened file in the MRU list.
